list_page_teaser: Ostensibly an action film, The Matrix movies and the characters in them are actually very deep.  Click to learn more!
description_html:
These images of the personalities of the three main characters in The Matrix Trilogy have depth, showing they are all idealistic. Their team lacks someone who is down-to-earth and pragmatic, but otherwise it is diverse.

Neo is the deepest of the three, and Morpheus is the warmest and most outgoing. Trinity shares their vision of the future, while her cool, calm, and collected nature compliments the warmth of Neo and Morpheus.
story_html:
The Blu-Ray DVDs of the trilogy that I have contain several commentary tracks that lend a great deal of insight into the series. The Wachowskis, who wrote and directed the movies, deliberately solicited both movie critics and philosophers to provide the commentaries, ensuring viewers would hear details based on diverse points of view.

To learn when I post images of other characters in movies, follow this site on social media or subscribe to the Artsy Visions Monthly Newsletter!

image_list.title: "Neo"
image_list.subtitle_html: Computer Programmer Thomas Anderson
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Neo's spiritual portrait shows he is deep, withdrawn, and motivated by his passion.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Red in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, Feeling: passion; amiability; friendliness; compassion; warmth; very slight/moderate/strong preference for emotion/empathy/subjectivity over logic/reason/objectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the/tendency to be more emotional/personal/subjective over the logical/rational/objective.

The Red in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making emotional/personal/objective rather than logical/rational/objective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be more emotional/personal/subjective rather than logical/impersonal/objective.
image_list.explain_dom_constant: In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_dom_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference/tendency is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary personality trait, iNtuition: idealism and hope for the future; openness to new ideas; very slight/moderate/strong preference for ideas over facts; need for intellectual stimulation.

The Blue in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing/tendency to see the world more in terms of ideas than of facts.
image_list.explain_aux_constant: In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_aux_very_slight_preference: It's important to note this preference is very slight, and X can be quite _____ in some situations/when the situation calls for it.
